item.title: New release - No Man Isle by Haunted By Silhouettes
item.description: Kick start the weekend with the brand new EP No Man Isle by Haunted By Silhouettes 💥 I have had a lot of fun recording keyboards, sound effects and accordion on this 🤠🤘 Have a nice weekend!
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: Make fuzz not war
item.description: Thank you so much, Angus at ABL Pedals for building this amazing pedal and donating the proceeds to the DEC Ukraine Humanitarian Appeal 💙💛🇺🇦 Слава Украине!✊
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: New release - Selkie by Haunted By Silhouettes
item.description: Haunted By Silhouettes is out with a new song featuring Björn Strid from i.a. Soilwork and The Night Flight Orchestra. The song is from the upcoming EP No Man Isle which I've had the honor of participating on.
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: New release - Flock by Haunted By Silhouettes
item.description: I have been so lucky to play keyboards on the upcoming EP No Man Isle by Haunted By Silhouettes 😃 Today they've released the first song Flock and it sounds insanely good 🤠🤘
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: New release - Fired Up by Kaasin
item.description: The album Fired Up by Kaasin is now released 🎉 Available on all streaming services and as a CD 💿
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: An oddball is featured in in "Varden" and "NRK Vestfold og Telemark" today
item.description: This is the living room of Benjamin (32): - "Everything" of salaries since junior high has been used 💸 Photo by: Andreas Soltvedt 📷
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: New release - Wrong by Kaasin
item.description: The new song Wrong by Kaasin has been released. Wrong will also be featured on the upcoming album Fired Up.
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: New effects unit - Ace Tone FM-2 Fuzz Master Professional
item.description: Got a new fuzz pedal today 😃 FM-2 Fuzz Master Professional by Ace 🔊Tone
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: Music video - We Are One by Kaasin
item.description: New song by Kaasin with music video shot at Systemblokk in Bø 🧱 The music video is made by Jon Sandersen 🎥
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: Coming soon - Fired Up by Kaasin
item.description: The debut album Fired Up by Kaasin will be released November 10th, 2021 🔥🎶🎵💿
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: MS-20 brass
item.description: Recording some "brass" with a Korg MS-20 synthesizer 🎹🎛️🎺
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: Overdriven Pro-One
item.description: Sequential Circuits Pro-One synthesizer with slapback tape echo into a Vox AC15 🎹🎛️📼🔊
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: New release - Guardian Angels by Haaker
item.description: A smoking hot metal song from Pål is now out 🤘 I've had the pleasure of playing keyboard instruments on this one 🎹🎛
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: Shooting music video for We Are One by Kaasin
item.description: Recording music video for the next single release from Kaasin with Jon Sandersen behind the camera 🎥🎬
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: Wine glasses with tape echo and reverb
item.description: The recorded audio from wine glasses sent through a Fulltone Tube Tape Echo and a Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978 reverb 🍷📼🦄🔊
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: Recording wine glasses
item.description: Recording some wine glass tracks with a pair of AKG C451E 🎤🍷🍷
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: Clavinet, piano, organ and a 5/4 groove
item.description: Recording a part in 5/4 time signature with Hohner Clavinet D6, Louis Zwicki Pianette and Hammond C3 🦡🦚🦄🎹
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: New release - Hidden by Kaasin
item.description: New rock music from Kaasin released today 💥🦄🔊 Perfect music to listen to while weeding the flower bed 👌🌼🌸 Have a nice weekend and summer! 🌞
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: Trying out some Clavinet pedal combinations
item.description: Running the Clavinet through an Electro-Harmonix Bassballs, Pro Co RAT 2 and Roger Mayer Voodoo-Vibe+ 🎹🎛️🔊
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli

item.title: New effects unit - CXM 1978
item.description: Got a new reverb pedal today 🥳 CXM 1978 from Chase Bliss Audio and Meris 🛸👌
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dehli
